channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-11995] Use Connection and ConnectionFactory where possible
item.description: HBASE-11825 introduced Connection and ConnectionFactory. Uses of HConnection and HConnectionManager should be migrated to use Connection and ConnectionFactory, if possible.
item.summary: Use Connection and ConnectionFactory where possible

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: There were a lot of low hanging fruit with the HConnection -> Connection change.
There were two types of changes I made: 1) HConnection -> Connection 2) HConnectionManager.createConnection() ->ConnectionFactory.createConnection()

Slightly rebased patch.

Will commit if hadoopqa passes.

-1 overall. Here are the results of testing the latest attachment
http://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12671137/HBASE_11995.patch
against trunk revision .
ATTACHMENT ID: 12671137

+1 @author. The patch does not contain any @author tags.

+1 tests included. The patch appears to include 39 new or modified tests.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javac. The applied patch does not increase the total number of javac compiler warnings.

+1 javadoc. The javadoc tool did not generate any warning messages.

+1 findbugs. The patch does not introduce any new Findbugs (version 2.0.3) warnings.

+1 release audit. The applied patch does not increase the total number of release audit warnings.

-1 lineLengths. The patch introduces the following lines longer than 100:
+ static void cycle(int id, final Configuration c, final Connection sharedConnection) throws IOException {
+ Connection unmanagedConnection = ConnectionFactory.createConnection(TEST_UTIL.getConfiguration());

+1 site. The mvn site goal succeeds with this patch.

-1 core tests. The patch failed these unit tests:
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.mapreduce.TestImportExport
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.util.TestProcessBasedCluster
org.apache.hadoop.hbase.client.TestMultiParallel

-1 core zombie tests. There are 5 zombie test(s): at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestSplitLogWorker.testRaceForTask(TestSplitLogWorker.java:282)
at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestFSErrorsExposed.testFullSystemBubblesFSErrors(TestFSErrorsExposed.java:228)
at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestAtomicOperation.testRowMutationMultiThreads(TestAtomicOperation.java:393)
at org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestStore.testHandleErrorsInFlush(TestStore.java:734)

Test results: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11069//testReport/
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11069//artifact/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-client.html

Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11069//artifact/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-prefix-tree.html
Findbugs warnings: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11069//artifact/patchprocess/newPatchFindbugsWarningshbase-common.html
Console output: https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-HBASE-Build/11069//console

This message is automatically generated.
I've pushed this to master and branch-1. Thanks Solomon.
